summary: This document is a Closing Protection Letter from First American Title Insurance Company regarding title insurance for real estate transactions in North Carolina. It outlines the conditions and exclusions of coverage, as well as the responsibilities of the Issuing Agent or Approved Attorney involved in the transactions. The letter is signed by Phillip Sholar, SVP, Director of Underwriting.

persons.name: Phillip Sholar
persons.context: Phillip Sholar is the signatory of the Closing Protection Letter, representing First American Title Insurance Company.

locations: 7360 Bryan Dairy Rd., Suite 200, Largo, FL, 33777
I First American Way, Santa Ana, CA 92707
keyFacts: The document is a Closing Protection Letter from First American Title Insurance Company dated November 7, 2014.
It outlines the conditions under which the company agrees to reimburse for actual loss incurred during real estate closings.
The coverage is limited to real property transactions in North Carolina.
Claims must be made within three years from the date of closing.
The letter cancels any previous Closing Protection Letter or similar agreement regarding real estate transactions.
